availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Miles (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Samuel A. Miles and Rebecca Miles. Married to Louisa "Lucy" E. Quisenberry Miles on October 2, 1855. Father of Virginia T. Miles. Farmer in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 440. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Lovelaceville, p. 148. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Lovelaceville, p. 47. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, McCracken County, Marriages, 1855, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky (accessed via Ancestry).
